mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(a.n_dzzl,2) nDzzl, b.c_username cUsername, b.c_loginname cLoginname, a.c_userid cUserid FROM t_green_gold_dzhz a, plate_user b WHERE a.c_userid = b.c_userid ORDER BY a.n_dzzl DESC ,a.d_xgsj LIMIT 0,10

SELECT b.c_userid, ROUND(b.n_dzzl,2) n_dzzl, b.c_bz, b.c_zt, b.c_cjuser, b.d_cjsj, b.c_xguser, b.d_xgsj, b.rank FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS 'rank' FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM t_green_gold_dzhz ORDER BY n_dzzl DESC ,d_xgsj ) AS t ) AS b WHERE b.c_userid = #{cUserid} and b.c_zt='1';
SELECT t.c_userid cUserid, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) 'rank' FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM t_green_gold_dzhz WHERE c_zt = '1' AND n_dzzl > 0 ORDER BY n_dzzl DESC, d_xgsj ) AS t
mapper.update: UPDATE t_green_gold_dzhz SET n_dzzl = #{nDzzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, c_xguser = #{cXguser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_xgsj = #{dXgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_bz = #{cBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
